title: Hunter x Hunter Episode 101 - Chapter 255

speechContent: I don't want my legs cut off, but I don't want to surrender!

speechContent: I don't care if this is the end, so I'll use everything.

title: Episode 1 - A Boy Setting Out for a Journey X Leaving Behind the Sound of the Wind
speechContent: For the right price, you can buy not only treasures, but dreams, hearts and even people's lives
